entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:41 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
